org.jetel.graph.dictionary

Interface IDictionaryType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanDictionaryType, ByteDictionaryType, DateDictionaryType, DecimalDictionaryType, DictionaryType, IntegerDictionaryType, ListDictionaryType, LongDictionaryType, MapDictionaryType, NumberDictionaryType, ObjectDictionaryType, ReadableChannelDictionaryType, StringDictionaryType, WritableChannelDictionaryType

    public interface IDictionaryType
    This interface represents a type of a dictionary entry. Implementation serves to provide ability to build up dictionary value from the given properties or validates a given value as a proper content of a dictionary entry. It is intended to be implemented in various external plugins for their internal dictionary value types.

      • getFieldType

        DataFieldType getFieldType()
        Returns:
        corresponding metadata field type, i.e. DataFieldType.STRING, ... or null if does not exist

      • getFieldType

        DataFieldType getFieldType(java.lang.String contentType)
        Returns:
        corresponding metadata field type, i.e. DataFieldType.STRING, ... or null if does not exist NOTE: contentType is used only for List and Map dictionary types, where field type is actually encoded in contentType

      • getFieldContainerType

        DataFieldContainerType getFieldContainerType()
        Returns:
        container type SINGLE, LIST or MAP of this dictionary type; null is returned for non clover data types (for example channels)
